name: Trinity (itch) (Clawstark)
description:
The world is covered by Malmort's curse. Malmort is a being created by the greed of humans breaking the holy trinity between nature, humans and animals.You will play as Trinity, a being made with the wishes of a better world to fix those mistakes.

Use the combined powers of Nature, Humans and Animals to eradicate Malmort and it's curse!

Controls : 

Move with ZQSD

Jump with Spacebar

Start the purification with Left clic! 

Be careful not to have your purification link broken !
